table.name: vtiger_serviceassignrule
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_serviceassignrule` ( `serviceassignruleid` int(11) NOT NULL, `assigntype` varchar(20) default NULL, `related_to` varchar(20) default NULL, `departmentid` varchar(20) default NULL, `productid` varchar(20) default NULL, `serviceid` int(19) DEFAULT '0', `ownerid` varchar(20) default NULL, `creatorid` int(19) DEFAULT '0', `createdtime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `modifiedby` int(19) DEFAULT '0', `modifiedtime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `remark` text, PRIMARY KEY (`serviceassignruleid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
